SELECT pinfo.purchase_date AS purchaseDate, pinfo.purchase_code AS purchaseCode, pinfo.payment_status AS paymentStatus, cs.cust_code AS purchaseDate, cs.cust_name AS custName, /*pinfo.cust_phone_num AS custPhoneNum,*/ pinfo.currency AS currency, pinfo.exchange_rate AS exchangeRate, pinfo.delivery_address AS deliveryAddress, uinfo.real_name AS salesmanName, pinfo.purchase_project AS purchaseProject, pinfo.purchase_order_code AS purchaseOrderCode, pinfo.invoice_code AS invoiceCode, pinfo.remarks AS purchaseRemark, pinfo.receivable_accoun AS purchaseSumVolume, pinfo.discount_amount AS discountAmount, pinfo.collection_terms AS collectionTerms, pinfo.account_period AS accountPeriod, CASE WHEN pinfo.flow_state = 1 THEN '财务审批' WHEN pinfo.flow_state = 2 THEN '仓库审批' ELSE '完成' END flowStatus, pinfo.create_user AS createUser FROM tab_purchase_info pinfo LEFT JOIN tab_user_info uinfo ON pinfo.user_code = uinfo.user_code LEFT JOIN tab_customer_supplier cs ON cs.cust_code = pinfo.cust_code AND cs.cust_type IN (2, 3) WHERE 1 = 1
AND pinfo.purchase_date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND pinfo.purchase_date <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
AND pinfo.purchase_code LIKE CONCAT(#{purchaseCode}, '%')
AND pinfo.salesman_code=#{salesmanCode}
AND pinfo.flow_state = #{flowState}
ORDER BY pinfo.purchase_date, pinfo.purchase_code
